content: this stylish summer crochet pattern would be the perfect addition to your wardrobe the design is a top-down raglan with lace detailing you won t be able to get enough of plus it works up incredibly fast note this pattern is part of a crochet-along the free link will take you to part 1 of the pattern there you can also find links to part 2 there is also a kid s version here 1 instructions are written in us crochet terms but you must already know the basics of crochet materials needed - lion brand jeans yarn 2-4 skeins depending on your size - total yardage for each size s-2xl 470 550 620 700 780 - k crochet hook or size to obtain gauge - yarn needle sizing available in sizes s-2xl this top looks great in size small as well as in all the larger sizes finished bust size 33 39 45 50 56 inches instructions included for how to pick a size that best suits you skill level intermediate uses all easy stitches but it is a raglan style terms of use this pattern is my original design it is for private use only please do not redistribute or resell it in any way if you have any questions please contact me and i will do my best to help to see more of my projects & patterns visit me on facebook and instagram www instagram com/desertblossomcrafts www facebook com/desertblossomcrafts/ thanks for visiting i hope you are inspired rachel 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mini-midnight-top
